Posts.EditableText:
Anyone ever seen this one?

```Play.aspx?id=xihotmn5h0qdtpgipyp6lg:1 Failed to load http://textadventures.co.uk/games/save/?id=xihotmn5h0qdtpgipyp6lg: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. Origin 'http://play2.textadventures.co.uk' is therefore not allowed access. The response had HTTP status code 500.```

I can save other games, but this one doesn't want to be saved.  (This game is quite large.  It has around 70,000 lines of code.)

---

Anyone ever seen this one?

Posts.EditableText:
How big is a save game? You could try on the desktop version to see.

A blank game is around 322 kb just with the built in stuff. Is it vastly more than that?
Posts.HTML:
How big is a save game? You could try on the desktop version to see.

A blank game is around 322 kb just with the built in stuff. Is it vastly more than that?

Posts.EditableText: When saving in the desktop version, the save file is 9,927 KB.
Posts.HTML: When saving in the desktop version, the save file is 9,927 KB.

Posts.EditableText: Nearly 10 Mb is big! I do not know if there is a limit, but seems likely to be the issue. I have no access to the servers, so cannot offer any more advice I am afraid.
Posts.HTML: Nearly 10 Mb is big! I do not know if there is a limit, but seems likely to be the issue. I have no access to the servers, so cannot offer any more advice I am afraid.

Posts.EditableText:
That's cool.  Thanks for investigating it, Pix.

---
@manowar

Do you know of a limit?
Posts.HTML:
That's cool. Thanks for investigating it, Pix.

@manowar

Do you know of a limit?

Posts.EditableText: note to self: remember this conversation.
CheeseMyBaby, if you are worried (and using the desktop version) do a save and check the file size. You will finds it is well short of 10 Mb.
Posts.HTML: CheeseMyBaby, if you are worried (and using the desktop version) do a save and check the file size. You will finds it is well short of 10 Mb.

Posts.EditableText: Yeah, this particular game is HUGE. The save file weighs in at 77,182 lines and is comprised of 10,164,155 characters (or so says Notepad++).
Posts.HTML:
Yeah, this particular game is HUGE.

The save file weighs in at 77,182 lines and is comprised of 10,164,155 characters (or so says Notepad++).

Posts.EditableText:
Hello K.V. 

I'm going to review and as soon as I can I'll tell you something about it.
Posts.HTML:
Hello K.V.

I'm going to review and as soon as I can I'll tell you something about it.

Posts.EditableText: K.V. please, can you login in secure mode in https://textadventures.co.uk and try?
Posts.HTML: K.V. please, can you login in secure mode in https://textadventures.co.uk and try?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello, manowar!

I just tried it, and I get this now:
```
Cross-Origin Request Blocked: The Same Origin Policy disallows reading the remote resource at http://textadventures.co.uk/games/save/?id=xihotmn5h0qdtpgipyp6lg. (Reason: CORS header âAccess-Control-Allow-Originâ missing).
```

I'll send you a message with more details.  (It isn't my game.  I'm just helping out a little.)

---
I think the error messages are worded differently because I was using Chrome the first time and Firefox the second time.
Posts.HTML:
Hello, manowar!

I just tried it, and I get this now:

Cross-Origin Request Blocked: The Same Origin Policy disallows reading the remote resource at http://textadventures.co.uk/games/save/?id=xihotmn5h0qdtpgipyp6lg. (Reason: CORS header âAccess-Control-Allow-Originâ missing).

I'll send you a message with more details. (It isn't my game. I'm just helping out a little.)

I think the error messages are worded differently because I was using Chrome the first time and Firefox the second time.
